about_the_game:
This DLC unlocks package of the textures for PAINT mode.
In the PAINT mode user may change textures of the models, add stickers and patterns.
For each model user may have 3 presets of the paints, this DLC unlocks 3 additional presets for each model.
detailed_description:
This DLC unlocks package of the textures for PAINT mode.
In the PAINT mode user may change textures of the models, add stickers and patterns.
For each model user may have 3 presets of the paints, this DLC unlocks 3 additional presets for each model.
